title: Did Sen. Cotton Say Slavery Was a ‘Necessary Evil’?
subtitle: The Republican senator faced backlash after he criticized a school curriculum on slavery.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: In July 2020, U.S. Sen. Tom Cotton criticized a school curriculum based on The New York Times' The 1619 project by saying of slavery, "As the Founding Fathers said, it was the necessary evil upon which the union was built..."
